name: Fitsises
description: A game about adventurers and maids of postnuclear world, who use ski for walking and being the heroes - their name is Fitsises, and you are one of them. See how life changed after 320 years and learn their lifestyle: Explore snowy islands, wars and modern people, be a spy and a courier, and meet the absolutely another society in "Fitsises" for absolutely free!(Only in beta...)
